<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H7239|רִבּוֹ]]</big>**</small>
 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָבַב‎</span>] **verb** ==be or become, many, much== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַב‎</span> especially ***lord, master***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַבִּי‎</span> ***my master teacher***; [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>5</sup> adjective plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבן‎</span>; Ph <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רב‎</span> feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבת‎</span>; Assyrian [<abbr title="transliteration"><u>***rabâbu***</u></abbr>], ***rabbu***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***rear, increase*** (active; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***thick juice***, compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְבָב‎</span> ***grease*** is thought by [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] and others to indicate original meaning ***be thick***), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***lord, owner, master***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רב‎</span> especially in proper names, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבאל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבבם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבשמסם‎</span>, etc., [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv,nos-285, 3; 286,1; 287,12</sup>, etc.; Lihyanian <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבה‎</span> ***its lord*** [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Epigr.Denkm.Arabic 232</sup>; Eth <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***expund, spread*** (intransitive); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רַב‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***great, chief***, so Old Aramaic, Nabataean, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רב‎</span>, [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>366</sup> [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>107</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרַבָּה‎</span> [[Exod.23.29|Exod 23:29]]; [[Isa.6.12|Isa 6:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָ֑בָּה‎</span> [[Gen.18.20|Gen 18:20]] ([[Hos.9.7|Hos 9:7]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרֹב הַמּשְׂטֵמָה‎</span> [for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרַבָּה מ‎</span>] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]. [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]); elsewhere only 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַבּוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.25.10|1Sam 25:10]]+, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָ֑בּוּ‎</span> [[Jer.46.23|Jer 46:23]]+2 t. [other forms supplied by  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבה‎</span> q. v.]; ***Infinitivecstr*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹב‎</span> [[Gen.6.1|Gen 6:1]]; [[Josh.9.13|Josh 9:13]]; [[Lev.25.16|Lev 25:16]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעֹט‎</span>), suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֻבְּכֶם‎</span> [[Deut.7.7|Deut 7:7]], and perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֻבָּם‎</span> [[Hos.4.7|Hos 4:7]] (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹב‎</span> below); — 

**1.** ***be (become) many***, person [[Gen.6.1|Gen 6:1]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Exod.23.29|Exod 23:29]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; see above), [[1Sam.25.10|1Sam 25:10]]; [[Hos.4.7|Hos 4:7]] (perhaps), [[Isa.66.16|Isa 66:16]]; [[Ps.3.2|Ps 3:2]]; [[Ps.25.19|Ps 25:19]]; [[Ps.38.20|Ps 38:20]]; [[Eccl.5.10|Eccl 5:10]]+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> compare [[Jer.46.23|Jer 46:23]]; [[Deut.7.7|Deut 7:7]]; [[Ps.69.5|Ps 69:5]] of things [[Isa.22.9|Isa 22:9]]; [[Ps.4.8|Ps 4:8]]; [[Ps.104.24|Ps 104:24]], years [[Lev.25.16|Lev 25:16]]([[BDB#P|P]]), sins [[Jer.5.6|Jer 5:6]]; [[Jer.14.7|Jer 14:7]]; [[Isa.59.12|Isa 59:12]]; [[Job.35.6|Job 35:6]] . 

**2.** ***become great***, [[Gen.18.20|Gen 18:20]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Isa.6.12|Isa 6:12]] ***be long***, of journey, [[Josh.9.13|Josh 9:13]] — 

**Pu\`al** see [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָבַב‎</span>] **denom** 



 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רבב‎</span> (√ of following; see Biblical Hebrew I. <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רבב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רַב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רִבּוֺ‎</span>).
